class.name: Steam
class.brief_description: SteamWorks API bindings for the Godot game engine.
class.description:
There are a few things you'll need to start working with the module:
- GodotSteam Module For Godot 2 / 3 - The Steamworks SDK (https://partner.steamgames.com/). - A Steamworks account. - The Godot Engine source code; preferably 2.0.3 or higher (https://github.com/godotengine/godot). Make sure this source matches the GodotSteam branch you are using or vice-versa.
Those are the basics to working with the wrapper. How, to get the most out of it, you'll need these too: - Logged into your Steam client if testing your game or any scenes.
From here either navigate to the Module How-To or Tutorials.

method.name: getFriendGameLobbies
method.description: Returns an Array of game lobbies (as FriendGameInfo objects) from the users friends list.

method.name: getFriendGamePlayed
method.description: Checks if friend with *steamID* has this game. Returns FriendGameInfo object to the passed in friendGameInfo parameter.

method.name: getFriendGamePlayedD
method.description: Checks if friend with *steamID* has this game. Returns friendGameInfo as a Dictionary of values. Possible keys include: id, ip, gamePort, queryPort, lobby, and error

method.name: getFriendPersonaName
method.description: Returns the local player's user name.
